Sql.query: insert into prn_version( prnvercodi, prnvernomb, prnverestado, prnverusucreacion, prnverfeccreacion ) values( :prnvercodi, :prnvernomb, :prnverestado, :prnverusucreacion, :prnverfeccreacion )
select prnvercodi, prnvernomb, prnverestado, prnverusucreacion, prnverfeccreacion, prnverusumodificacion, prnverfecmodificacion from prn_version

update prn_version set prnvernomb = :prnvernomb, prnverestado = :prnverestado, prnverusumodificacion = :prnverusumodificacion, prnverfecmodificacion = :prnverfecmodificacion where prnvercodi = :prnvercodi
select prnvercodi, prnvernomb, prnverestado, prnverusucreacion, prnverfeccreacion, prnverusumodificacion, prnverfecmodificacion from prn_version where prnvercodi = :codigo

select distinct rr.prnredbarracp, gr.gruponomb, rr.prnredbarrapm, rr.prnredgauss, rr.prnredperdida, rr.prnredtipo from prn_version vr join prn_reduccionred rr on vr.prnvercodi = rr.prnvercodi and (vr.prnverestado = 'A') join pr_grupo gr on rr.prnredbarracp = gr.grupocodi where rr.prnredbarracp in ({0}) or '0' = '{0}' order by rr.prnredbarracp, rr.prnredbarrapm
